about_the_game:
Reclaim your games!


Jumpfist is a fast paced platformer that will test even the most seasoned of gamers!

Jump, punch, slide & elbow-drop your way through mayhem and reclaim your stolen games!

You like fast paced platformers do you?

You want a challenge you say?

JumpFist is designed to test you, challenge you and yes....break you (legit i threw my controller down a few times beta testing)

Jump, slide, punch and elbow drop your way through 40 levels!

Too hard? Jump with a friend, local co-op available.

Beat the developer times and become the fastest!

Hilarious death commentary!

JumpFist is here! Try the first 5 levels for free in the demo!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX v10.5 onwards
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Strongly Recommended
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX v10.5 onwards
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller Strongly Recommended

name: JumpFist Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller strongly recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller strongly recommended
